import React from "react" const style = { form: `flex flex-col p-5 rounded-md bg-[#aaa9] border-2 border-[#3339]`, input: `my-4 mx-2 rounded`, button: `my-4 mx-2 rounded`, } const AuthForm = (props) => { const { handleChange, handleSubmit, btnText, errMsg, inputs: { username, password }, } = props return (

Sign in to your account

{errMsg}

) } export default AuthForm
